stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: Hello. My name is XXX01. What is your name?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: I'm fine, but I'm a little nervous.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: so, have you been busy these days?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: Yes. Because, I had to hand in my graduation thesis in December, so I was busy, but now I finished it. So.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: I see. So now, winter vacation is soon coming, right?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: yes, but now, not yet. maybe next week, winter vacation will start.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: I see. What's you plan for the holiday?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: I don't have any plan. Maybe, I work for five or six days. But I don't go any place.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: What kind of job will you do?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: I have a part-time job as a receptionist at a computer school. Maybe, twenty eighth or twenty ninth is the last day my work.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: I see. and are you going to eat nice new year food after that?

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: Because I don't like Japanese typical new year food, so I want to eat normal food.

stage_1.speaker: examiner
stage_1.text: really? but they are delicious, I guess.

stage_1.speaker: candidate
stage_1.text: I don't like Osechi. Why not? since I was I was small, I don't like it.

stage_2.speaker: examiner
stage_2.text: I see. ok, thank you, XXX02. Now, I'm going to show you a picture. Please describe it.

stage_2.speaker: candidate
stage_2.text: It's a sunny day, and it's a small town. And there are three houses, but I guess there are lot of houses. And in front of one house, one girl play nawatobi, and then, on the road, one guy is running and he is sweating. And on the road, there is one car, and on the car one cat is sleeping. And near the car two women is talking and one woman is with maybe her dog. And opposite the road, there is one old man reading newspaper and sitting the chair.

stage_2.speaker: examiner
stage_2.text: ok, great, XXX02. Thank you. we see some pets here, but do you have a pet?

stage_2.speaker: candidate
stage_2.text: yes. I have one cat. and she has ugly face. She has a lots of colorful hair, and very mixed. That looks like ugly.

stage_2.speaker: examiner
stage_2.text: How did you get the cat?

stage_2.speaker: candidate
stage_2.text: because my cat came my house, and she looks like very hungry. And she was very small, so we thought poor cat, and maybe she was one young cat, and we was getting to give her foods. So, she thought this was my house.

stage_2.speaker: examiner
stage_2.text: I see. ok. Thank you. Nice family.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok, thank you. Now please read this card, and let's do the role play. ok? Are you ready?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: Yes.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: Hello. May I help you, miss?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: yes. sorry, I want to watch. and I prefer leather watch. do you have something special one?

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: Something special?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: Yeah. because I want to give it my father for his birthday. so band is made of leather, I mean. Do you have it?

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: yes, but it depends on the price. The designs will be different, so how much can you pay for that?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: maybe I said I'm I want to have special one, but I don't have enough money, so it costs around fifty thousand yen.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok. Then you can buy nice one. How about this one? This is nice for a businessman, I guess.

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: Businessman? but I mi I think it's a little simple.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: I see. What kind of design do you like?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: I like this one, but I prefer more decorated.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok. Then, how about this one? This is great one, and just fifty thousand yen.

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: Fifty thousand? yeah. So I want to buy it.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok. Thank you. And how would you like to pay?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: by cash.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok. ok, here you go. Thank you very much.

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: Thank you very much.

stage_3.speaker: examiner
stage_3.text: ok. Great, XXX02. So, for this Christmas, are you going to buy a present for your father?

stage_3.speaker: candidate
stage_3.text: yes. I want to buy some comfortable sweater. But I don't have enough money. so now, I look for some good one.

stage_4.speaker: examiner
stage_4.text: nice. ok. Thank you, XXX02. Now, please look at this. Make a story using these six pictures. And please start with "One day last week".

stage_4.speaker: candidate
stage_4.text: "One day last week"? ok. one day after class, one university student and his professor go to some restaurant. And his professor recommended one restaurant, so he followeded his professor. And then, his professor has favorite seat, so he said "I wanted to sit that table.". And after sitting, one waitress asked them the menu, and university student felt very hungry. So, he asked her big dishes, and his professor said, "That was ok. you were young so you had better to eat a lot.". his professor felt very happy and they enjoyed very much. So the university student ordered some beer. And after eating, his professor said, "That was my treat," so his professor paid all money. And university student felt very happy. After that, they said, "Good-bye.".

stage_4.speaker: examiner
stage_4.text: Good. Thank you. XXX02, does it often happen that students go out drinking with their professor?

stage_4.speaker: candidate
stage_4.text: maybe once a week. No, no, no. Week, no, no, no, no. Once a year. After all class finished. Maybe, professor paid all money.

stage_4.speaker: examiner
stage_4.text: And what do you think of that as a student?

stage_4.speaker: candidate
stage_4.text: but when I had a chance to eat with my professor, I felt so nervous, so I don't like it. yes.

stage_5.speaker: examiner
stage_5.text: Thank you. So the interview is almost over, but what's your plan for this weekend?

stage_5.speaker: candidate
stage_5.text: This weekend? This weekend, on Saturday, I'm going to work.

stage_5.speaker: examiner
stage_5.text: you have to work on Saturday?

stage_5.speaker: candidate
stage_5.text: usually I work on Saturday. And on Sunday, I don't have any plan.

stage_5.speaker: examiner
stage_5.text: ok. Thank you very much for coming in today.
